typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		users as (userId as string, firstName as string, lastName as string, phoneNumber as string, emailAddress as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> MyDataFlow
MyDataFlow foldDown(unroll(users),
	mapColumn(
		users
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 derive(users = @(id=users.userId,
		name=concat(toString(users.firstName), " ", toString(users.lastName)),
		number=users.phoneNumber,
		email=users.emailAddress)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['sink2.json'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		users = users
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
